attributes.action: All NHS staff to be recognised with a service medal for Covid period
attributes.additional_details: Our NHS staff have worked hard through the pandemic and have gone above and beyond. Nothing is ever hard work and they need recognising for this. The government need to reward these with a NHS COVID-19 service medal
attributes.background: To recognise all NHS staff with a service medal for working through the coronavirus pandemic. Risking their own lives in this trying time.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560402
